statements: UPDATE soil_health_monitoring SET soil_ph = 6.5, nutrient_levels = '{"nitrogen": 10, "phosphorus": 15}' WHERE plot_id = 1;
UPDATE soil_health_monitoring SET nutrient_levels = '{"potassium": 20, "calcium": 25}', plot_name = 'Garden Plot' WHERE plot_id = 2;
UPDATE soil_health_monitoring SET soil_ph = 6.8, nutrient_levels = '{"nitrogen": 30, "phosphorus": 15, "potassium": 20}' WHERE plot_id = 1;
UPDATE soil_health_monitoring SET plot_name = 'Field A', soil_ph = 6.2 WHERE plot_id = 2;
UPDATE SoilHealth SET ph_level = 6.5, nutrient_level = 3.0 WHERE plot_id = 101;
UPDATE AgroforestryPlots SET tree_species = 'Maple' WHERE plot_size > 10;
UPDATE SoilHealth SET ph_level = 6.5, nutrient_level = 10 WHERE plot_id = 1;
UPDATE AgroforestryPlots SET tree_species = 'Maple', plot_size = 30.5 WHERE plot_id = 2;
UPDATE SoilHealthMonitoring SET soil_temperature = 25.5, soil_moisture = 0.7 WHERE plot_id = 1;
UPDATE AgroforestryPlots SET canopy_coverage = 0.8, tree_species = 'Oak' WHERE plot_id = 3;
UPDATE SoilHealthMonitoring SET soil_temperature = 25.6, pH_level = 6.8 WHERE plot_id = 1;
UPDATE NutrientLevels SET potassium = 3.2, nitrogen = 2.1 WHERE plot_id = 3;
UPDATE SoilHealthMonitor SET pH_level = 6.5, nutrient_level = 3.5 WHERE soil_id = 1;
UPDATE AgroforestryPlot SET area = 10.5, location = 'Field A' WHERE plot_id = 2;
UPDATE SoilHealthMonitor SET pH_level = 6.5, nutrient_level = 3.0 WHERE soil_id = 101
UPDATE MonitoringLog SET timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00', notes = 'pH and nutrient levels updated' WHERE log_id = 201
UPDATE soil_health SET soil_type='Clay' WHERE plot_id=1;
UPDATE temperature_data SET temperature=25.40, timestamp='2022-10-15 09:30:00' WHERE plot_id=3;
UPDATE plot_location SET latitude = 34.987654, longitude = -87.123456 WHERE plot_id = 101
UPDATE pH_level SET pH = 6.75,timestamp = '2022-05-10 08:00:00' WHERE plot_id = 201
